title: Rape. Part 1. Problems in proof
creator_credit: AIMS Instructional Media, Karen Smith, Richard Cullather and Richard Siegel
brief_description: Demonstrates the value of careful investigation, corroboration of the victim’s allegation of rape and the primary responsibility of the investigating officer. Studies evidentiary problems encountered at trial.
creator_credit_for_label: AIMS Instructional Media, Karen Smith, Richard Cullather and Richard Siegel
